name: oysite.com
overview: OySite enables its users to promote themselves and their businesses in innovative ways with a wide range of tools that add real value to professional networks. Unlike other social and professional networking sites, OySite distinguishes personal entities from those of businesses, allowing users to create unique profiles for each. This concept, coupled with usersâ€™ ability to write and publish press releases, upload promotional videos and commercial advertisements, join thematic groups, search for job opportunities and potential employees, write recommendations for clients, colleagues and partners, and much more, creates a very dynamic and engaging environment.
